short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate secure passwords in an easy-to-use extension. The extension generates passwords randomly without storing them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate secure passwords in an easy-to-use extension. The extension generates passwords randomly, you can choose any letter name you want for your password. No passwords are stored.
